name: Android Space Shooter
description:
Basic top down shooter reminiscent of old arcade days.  This game took about 2 weeks to finish, the assets were found online and thus why it is free to play.  I just wanted to get a quick game under my belt and hopefully create some social proof for Trys10Studios.  Let me know what you think in the comment section below!  Rate and share please!

How to Play Instructions:

Make sure the screen of your phone is facing the ceiling.  Tap the screen to fire your lasers and tilt the phone to move your ship!
